title: 96/266/EC: Commission Decision of 1 April 1996 recognizing in principle the completeness of the dossier submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of kresoxim methyl in Annex I of Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 1 April 1996 recognizing in principle the completeness of the dossier submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of kresoxim methyl in Annex I of Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market (Text with EEA relevance) (96/266/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The dossier submitted by BASF Aktiengesellschaft to the Commission and the Member States with a view to the inclusion of kresoxim methyl as active substance in Annex I of Directive 91/414/EEC is considered as satisfying in principle the data and information requirements provided for in Annex II and, for a plant protection product containing the active substance concerned, in Annex III of the Directive.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 April 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission

(2) OJ No L 65, 15. 3. 1996, p. 20.
